title: Networking
description: Generates a personalized message for connecting with a potential professional contact
prompt: Hello, my name is %%personname%% and I am a %%personprofession%%. I came across your profile and was impressed by your experience in the %%personindustry%% industry. I would love to connect and learn more about your work. Can you please tell me more about your experience and current projects?

title: Career Development
description: Provides advice for advancing your career
prompt: I have been working as a %%personprofession%% for %%personexperience%% now in the %%personindustry%% industry and I am seeking advice for %%seekingadvicefor%%. Can you please provide me with some advice on how to do this?

aiomaticfields.label: Experience
aiomaticfields.options:
Less than a year
Between 1 and 3 years
Between 3 and 5 years
Between 5 and 10 years
More than 10 years

aiomaticfields.label: Seeking Advice For
aiomaticfields.options:
Career Advancement
Career Change
Job Search
Interview Preparation
Networking

title: Business Strategy Advisor
description: Generate innovative solutions to grow your business.
prompt:
List 10 potential strategies to solve a problem in business, including unconventional ones.

Problem: Lack of sales growth
Solution Ideas:

1. Diversify your product line
2. Personalize your marketing approach
3. Utilize customer data to drive sales
4. Offer value-added services
5. Network with complementary businesses
6. Invest in employee training and development
7. Expand your target market
8. Utilize innovative technologies
9. Create a strong brand image
10. Leverage partnerships and collaborations

Problem: %%bsaproblem%%
Solution Ideas:
